suggestions.fileNotFound: Verify the file path exists and you have read permissions
suggestions.unsupportedFormat: Use .json, .yaml, or .yml file extensions for OpenAPI specifications
suggestions.missingOpenAPI: Add an 'openapi' field specifying the OpenAPI version (e.g., '3.0.3')
suggestions.missingInfo: Add an 'info' object with 'title' and 'version' properties
suggestions.missingInfoTitle: Add a 'title' field to the info object
suggestions.missingInfoVersion: Add a 'version' field to the info object
suggestions.missingPaths: Add a 'paths' object defining API endpoints
suggestions.externalReference: Use local references within the same document (starting with '#/')
suggestions.referenceNotFound: Ensure the referenced component exists in the components section
suggestions.allOfConflict: Resolve conflicting properties in allOf schemas
suggestions.oneOfDiscriminator: Add a discriminator property to distinguish oneOf variants
suggestions.anyOfNoVariants: Ensure anyOf contains at least one schema variant
